overview_of_class: Axiomatics for Euclidean geometry. Non-Euclidean geometry. Projective geometry. Introduction of coordinate system from the axioms. Quadrics. Erlangen program. Introduction to plane algebraic curves. Prerequisites: 230 and 300 or equivalent.
name: Geometry
title: WCAS MATH 340-0-81 Geometry

descriptions.value: Axiomatics for Euclidean geometry. Non-Euclidean geometry. Projective geometry. Introduction of coordinate system from the axioms. Quadrics. Erlangen program. Introduction to plane algebraic curves. Prerequisites: 230 and 300 or equivalent.
